remarks: Lemma for strong classical state theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
stcltr1.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ( S e. States /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( ( ( S ` x ) = 1 -> ( S ` y ) = 1 ) -> x C_ y ) ) ) $.
stcltr1.2 $e |- A e. CH $.
stcltrlem1.3 $e |- B e. CH $.
stcltrlem2 $p |- ( ph -> B C_ ( ( _|_ ` A ) vH ( A i^i B ) ) ) $.

$d B x y $.
$d S x y $.
